topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55785950636872235b00168b#post_55785950636872235b00168b
Emo music has been around the 1980s and was short for Emotive Hardcore. it has nothing to do with the Emo subculture and all of the bands who get referred to as Emo are really just really bad Pop Punk, Alternative and Metalcore/Post-Hardcore bands. its a common misconception


also i agree Green Day are highly overrated, their brand of Pop Punk sounds bland and mediocre
